parameter-group.name: telnetSettings
parameter-group.label: Telnet Settings
parameter-group.description: Settings for the Telnet port of the NAD Device

parameter-group.name: presets
parameter-group.label: Tuner Preset Details
parameter-group.description: Settings for the Tuner preset details for the NAD Device

parameter.name: hostname
parameter.label: Hostname
parameter.description: Hostname or IP address of the device

parameter.name: zoneCount
parameter.label: Zone Count of the Receiver
parameter.description: Number of zones (including main zone), values 1-4 are supported. Check Thing Properties to see maximum number of zones for this device.

parameter.name: ipAddress
parameter.label: IP Address
parameter.description: IPV4 address of the NAD A/V receiver

parameter.name: telnetPort
parameter.label: Port
parameter.description: Telnet port used for AVR communication. Normally shouldn't be changed.

parameter.name: enablePresetNames
parameter.label: Enable Preset Detail
parameter.description: User defined tuner preset details are provided in an external file. (Follow instructions in the binding description for creating this file.)

parameter.name: presetNamesFilePath
parameter.label: Preset Names File
parameter.description: File Name containing preset name details including path e.g. /etc/openhab/scripts/Preset_Names.xml
